visual_dna.composition: Centered profile view with integrated text elements

image_composition_analysis.focal_points: Primary focus on car profile with 75% saliency; secondary text elements provide context
image_composition_analysis.typography_style: Modern sans-serif, structured alignment, high readability

source_analysis.prompt_reconstruction: Automotive photography, sleek sports car in profile view, technical specifications overlay, soft lighting, cool gray and black color scheme, modern composition, commercial automotive style --ar 16:9 --style raw

video_prompt_json.lighting: soft studio lighting with gentle shadows
video_prompt_json.camera: slow dolly shot along car profile
video_prompt_json.movement: reveal of specifications, dynamic light sweeps

transformation_instructions: make a reel on this image for my porsche car make it race on an open road with realestic camera following. use the tagline "fast as hell"
